title: 2 2 "The Man in the Straw Hat" Marc Jobst Ian Stokes August 31, 2023(2023-08-31)
transformers_text: 2 2 The Man in the Straw Hat Marc Job st Ian Stokes August 31 2023 2023 08 31 Luffy Zoro and Nami are captured by another pirate captain Buggy the Clown Luffy swallows the Grand Line map beforehand He learns of Buggy's ties to his childhood idol Shanks from whom he received his treasured straw hat Buggy uses his Chop Chop Fruit powers which allow him to split himself apart to get the upper hand Buggy attempts to drown Luffy when he refuses to hand over the map Luffy remembers a childhood incident when Shanks saved him from drowning and protected him from a sea creature using a mysterious power at the cost of his left arm something Luffy blamed himself for The trio defeats Buggy and frees the town he imprisoned Marine Vice Admiral Gar p arrests Morgan for lying that traitors in the Marines allowed the pirate attack resulting in Helm ep po joining the Marines with Ko by Nami secretly contacts an anonymous figure about having the map
